body_html:
where is the default SDK level configured ? The workspace.bzl file config is always like below when I build the project of deferent versions :

workspace config:

android_sdk_repository(
name = "androidsdk",
api_level = 23,
build_tools_version = "25.0.1",
path = "/Users/scucheri/Library/Android/sdk",
)

android_ndk_repository(
name="androidndk",
path="/Users/scucheri/Library/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle",
api_level=14)

body:
where is the default SDK level configured  ?   The workspace.bzl file config is always like below when I build the project of deferent versions :

workspace config:

android_sdk_repository(
name = "androidsdk",
api_level = 23,
build_tools_version = "25.0.1",
path = "/Users/scucheri/Library/Android/sdk",
)

android_ndk_repository(
name="androidndk",
path="/Users/scucheri/Library/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle",
api_level=14)
